definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order

sentences.english: Notes on some species of Araliaceae from Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 貴州五加科某些種類的考訂。

sentences.english: What were we to do with our material ? First, the task of criticism.
sentences.chinese: 我們該怎樣處理這些材料呢？首先是進行考訂。

sentences.english: Hence, studying common words is also my article' s important task.
sentences.chinese: 所以，考訂俗字，也是本文的重要內容。

sentences.english: This is very important in furthur recognizing Chen and Wu's poems, which is the first time of systematically combing and collating their corresponding poems.
sentences.chinese: 此文首次對這些交往詩進行了較爲系統的爬梳與考訂。

definition: variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
to comment/a point by point commentary
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
Yi Zhuan, commentary on the "Book of Changes" or "I Ching" 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
